pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇaṃ undriyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.8: Atha kho te manussā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā parikkhāraṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.9: Thullanandā bhikkhunī tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñji.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.11: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.12: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.15: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:1.18: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.8: ekāya bhikkhuniyā, na saṃghassa, na gaṇassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.12: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.14: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.17: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.21: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.22: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:2.23: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
